channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- CODESYS Control for BeagleBone SL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- CODESYS Control for BeagleBone SL

item.title: CVE-2022-4046|2024-10-22T19:44:02.247Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: In CODESYS Control in multiple versions a improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer allow an remote attacker with user privileges to gain full access of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-8175|2024-09-25T13:33:10.408Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can causes the CODESYS web server to access invalid memory which results in a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-5000|2024-08-01T20:55:10.389Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use a malicious OPC UA client to send a crafted request to affected CODESYS products which can cause a DoS due to incorrect calculation of buffer size.

item.title: CVE-2024-5000|2024-06-06T14:44:44.216Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use a malicious OPC UA client to send a crafted request to affected CODESYS products which can cause a DoS due to incorrect calculation of buffer size.

item.title: CVE-2024-8175|2024-09-25T08:04:23.196Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can causes the CODESYS web server to access invalid memory which results in a DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-8175|2024-09-25T14:02:28.368Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can causes the CODESYS web server to access invalid memory which results in a DoS.
